dct_title_s: Partie de l'état de Rhode-Island et position des armées Américaine et Britannique au siége de Newport, et à l'affaire du 29 Août 1778
dct_description_sm: Map of area around Narragansett Bay, showing the positions of opposing forces during the battle of Rhode Island in 1778; relief shown by hachures. Above neat line at right: XI. Taken from atlas accompanying the French translation of The life of Washington by John Marshall; maps by Jean-Nicolas Buache. cf. Tooley's dictionary of mapmakers, vol. 1.
